content: **crocheted jumper in drops sky the piece is worked top down with round yoke double neck bobbles relief-pattern and lace pattern sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern skip-172 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 300-350-350-400-450-500 g colour 02 pearl grey crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm **crochet gauge** 16 treble crochets in width and 8 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
